website_summaries.verdict: An energy-efficient and UL-listed high-speed hand dryer.
pros: High-end sensor, circuit, and motor ensure long-lasting performance
Automatically detects hands from up to 8" away
cons: May require its own circuit due to the amperage it draws

customer_reviews.title: You cannot go wrong with these dryers.
customer_reviews.text: These dryers are great for our bathrooms, which have limited space. They take up much less room than most hand dryers. They are very attractive, look great and work great. Not blow you over powerful, but they are even nicer than the overly powerful ones. They do the job quite nicely. I prefer these, to the blow me over, one, I have in the other, bigger bathroom. You cannot go wrong with these dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Hand dryer
customer_reviews.text: My family enjoys using this hand dryer in our house. It comes with a plug verses hard wiring in the wall. This option allows us to relocate the dryer to any bathroom without calling a electrician for assistance. Currently, it's installed in the guess bathroom so no one has to touch our decorative towels. Yes, I would recommend to anyone who are constantly purchasing paper towels for their bathroom. It's more cost effective to hand this machine. Most definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, powerful, temperature well regulated.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this with wall power hook up, with made installation more difficult, but it was best for us. The dryer is very well made: the internal connections and wiring are good quality. It is immediately responsive with strong air flow and great temperature control for my wife's sensitive hands. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Earth friendly, great temps and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves the hand dryer! My coffee shop try’s to have the least amount of waste as possible and this has been a great addition! I love how I can change the temp through the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Kriegel

customer_reviews.title: Will buy another one for my other store
customer_reviews.text: Have this hand dryer at my laundromat business. So far it’s been working great. Turns on when you put your hands underneath and turns off after you remove them. Perfect blend of warm air and air speed.
customer_reviews.author: Gmako

customer_reviews.title: Strong, lasted so far
customer_reviews.text: Small size. But power was adequate. Great for this price level. Shuts off quickly. Kick in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: huiyang yifu

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed - compact works great easy to install - better than expected
customer_reviews.author: kent smalley

customer_reviews.title: Blows everything else away
customer_reviews.text: Why buy a over priced one. When this works better
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: prefect size and power for my laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This unit is exactly what we needed small compact and powerful enough. Please don’t look any further. my kids love it and use it often to keep their hands clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vin Ven

customer_reviews.title: It does what it was designed to do!
customer_reviews.text: This hand dryer works very well, and I had it placed in the guest bathroom at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carrier

customer_reviews.title: small size and reasonalble pricing
customer_reviews.text: decent air volume, take a while to heat up, but typical hands dry in about 15 seconds, best thing is the smaller size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. Saving money on all the paper towels!!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Cabezas

customer_reviews.title: The hand dryer works excellent for small unit it fits perfect in our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: The hand dryer works excellent for small unit it fits perfect in our bathroom. Has plenty of power and I'm going to buy another one for downstairs bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Workman3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, turns on and off when your hands are under it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Awoco Compact Stainless Steel Automatic High Speed Commercial Hand Dryer, 1350W 120V UL Listed, 1 Year Warranty (Compact)
feature_bullets: HIGH SPEED - Dry hands in just 10 to 15 seconds. Round air outlet makes the airflow more concentrated and faster. Safe 68°F to 104°F air temperature, won’t hurt children hands.

ENERGY & MONEY SAVE - Low energy consumption with superior power. 110V-120V AC, 1350W, low 2W standby power. Eliminates the need for paper towels. 45 seconds overtime protection for 1 continuous run; then next motion triggers a new run. This prevents continue running without attendance to save energy waste, such as sticky gum in sensor.

DURABLE & SANITARY - Easy to clean one piece seamless brush finish #304 stainless steel. Automatic touch-free infrared sensor detects hands from up to 6-8 inches away, reduces transmission of bacteria or microorganisms without touching. Detachable and washable air filters filter 99.97% of bacteria from the moist restroom air and prevent dust from entering the machine, extending the life of the dryer.

QUIET & COMPACT - Compact internal structure makes low noise, 72dB Noise level at 40 inches. Compact design fits limited space area but still meet commercial grade requirement. With power (red) and operate (blue) LED indicators.
UL & USA SUPPORT- UL Listed for safety, USA building code requires UL certified equipment. 1 year manufacturer USA warranty with parts, repair/exchange. Customer service and technical support in USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
